cashregister.ui

Interface ICashRegisterUI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CashRegisterConsoleUI, CashRegisterGUI

    public interface ICashRegisterUI
    Specifies the methods that a User Interface for an ICashRegister should implement. These methods are used to provide output of various attributes from an ICashRegister , such as the IProducts or Records, in a User Interface.
    Author:
    OOP

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void displayProducts(ITree<IProduct> products)
      Displays the provided products, given as an ITree, in a User Interface.
      void displayRecords(Collection<IInvoice> records)
      Displays Records, given in a Collection, in a User Interface.
      void displayShoppingCart(IShoppingCart shoppingCart)
      Displays a specific IShoppingCart.
      void displayShoppingCarts(Collection<IShoppingCart> shoppingCarts)
      Displays shoppingCarts, given in a Collection, in a User Interface.
      void displayTransaction(PaymentTransaction transaction)
      Displays a PaymentTransaction in a User Interface.
      void pushUpdateInformation(ITree<IProduct> products, Collection<IShoppingCart> carts, Collection<IInvoice> records)
      Is used to inform the User Interface about a change in one of the data sets.

    • Method Detail

      • displayProducts

        void displayProducts(ITree<IProduct> products)
        Displays the provided products, given as an ITree, in a User Interface.
        Parameters:
        products - the products that should be displayed

      • displayShoppingCarts

        void displayShoppingCarts(Collection<IShoppingCart> shoppingCarts)
        Displays shoppingCarts, given in a Collection, in a User Interface.
        Parameters:
        shoppingCarts - the collection of IShoppingCarts that should be displayed

      • displayShoppingCart

        void displayShoppingCart(IShoppingCart shoppingCart)
        Displays a specific IShoppingCart.
        Parameters:
        shoppingCart - the shoppingCart that should be displayed

      • displayRecords

        void displayRecords(Collection<IInvoice> records)
        Displays Records, given in a Collection, in a User Interface.
        Parameters:
        records - the collection of records that should be displayed

      • displayTransaction

        void displayTransaction(PaymentTransaction transaction)
        Displays a PaymentTransaction in a User Interface.
        Parameters:
        transaction - the transaction that should be displayed

      • pushUpdateInformation

        void pushUpdateInformation(ITree<IProduct> products,
                           Collection<IShoppingCart> carts,
                           Collection<IInvoice> records)
        Is used to inform the User Interface about a change in one of the data sets. A user interface may use this information or discard the notification.
        Parameters:
        products - IProducts stored in an ITree
        carts - IShoppingCarts given in a Collection
        records - records about IInvoices
